summary: Email chain between FBI Victim Services Division and a law firm partner regarding coordination for victim briefings about Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss RSVPs, security information, and visa assistance for victims attending briefings in New York and Florida in October 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to FBI briefings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
At least 8 clients of a law firm planned to attend the New York briefing session.
The FBI was assisting with expediting visas for victims to attend the briefings.
Security protocols required detailed personal information for attendees due to the federal building locations.
